subject: Entire office network down
description: Employees are unable to access the internet, file servers, or any internal systems. The issue started around 10:30 AM today.

subject: CRM software not loading
description: When attempting to open the CRM software, users receive an error message saying 'Application Failed to Load'. This issue is blocking all sales and customer service activities.

subject: Printer not responding
description: The printer was working fine yesterday, but now it shows an error message every time a print job is sent. The printer is still powered on, but no prints are coming out.

subject: Requesting admin access to server
description: As a senior developer, I need admin access to the internal server to make configuration changes related to our project. Currently, I only have limited user access.

subject: Wi-Fi not working in conference room
description: The Wi-Fi works fine in other areas of the office, but in the conference room, no devices can connect to the network.

subject: Excel crashing when opening large files
description: Whenever we try to open large Excel files, the application crashes. This has been an issue for the past week, and it’s affecting multiple users in the finance team.

subject: Missing desk chair
description: I’ve noticed that my desk chair is missing from my workstation, and I’ve reported it to the office admin team, but it hasn’t been replaced yet.

subject: Slow internet speed in accounting department
description: The internet speed has dropped significantly, and it’s impacting the ability to access cloud-based tools. This issue has been ongoing for about 3 days.

subject: Unable to access project repository
description: I need access to the project repository to complete my tasks, but I keep getting a permission denied error when I try to access it. This is blocking my work.

subject: Keyboard malfunctioning
description: Some keys on my keyboard, including the space bar and 'Enter' key, are not responding. It is making it difficult to work efficiently.

subject: Email server down
description: We are unable to access the email system, both for internal and external communication. The issue began around 8 AM today and is affecting all employees.

subject: Access request for project files
description: As a project manager, I require access to specific shared project files, but my current access level does not allow me to view or edit them.

subject: Network latency affecting work
description: The network latency has been unusually high for the last two hours, making it difficult to work on cloud-based tools or access shared drives.

subject: Mouse not functioning properly
description: The mouse stops responding randomly, and it requires unplugging and plugging back in to start working again. This is causing minor interruptions in my workflow.

subject: Accounting software not syncing data
description: Whenever an update is made in the software, it does not sync with the cloud database, causing data discrepancies between local and cloud systems.

subject: Intermittent Wi-Fi disconnects in office
description: Employees are reporting intermittent Wi-Fi disconnections in the lobby and meeting rooms, disrupting work during important calls and meetings.

subject: Desk lamp not working
description: I’ve checked the power supply, but the lamp is still not working. I would appreciate it if it could be replaced.

subject: Laptop screen cracked
description: My laptop screen was cracked during an accidental fall, and now it's difficult to work. I need a replacement screen or a new laptop.

subject: Request for admin access to content management system
description: I currently have user access but need admin rights to upload and manage new content for the company blog. My current permissions are limited.

subject: Slow internet speed during video calls
description: The video calls are lagging and breaking up intermittently. This issue seems to only affect video calls, not regular internet browsing.

subject: VPN is not working
description: When trying to connect to the company VPN, users are getting an authentication error. This issue has blocked all remote access.

subject: Monitor flickering
description: The monitor attached to my workstation flickers continuously and distorts the display, making it unusable for work.

subject: Slack app not syncing messages
description: When accessing Slack from my mobile device, messages are not appearing instantly. There's a delay of over 15 minutes between devices.

subject: No access to HR document repository
description: I need access to the HR document repository to view employee files, but my permissions do not allow me to open or download documents.

subject: Word document is corrupt
description: Every time I try to open a specific Word document, it crashes the application. I am unable to recover the document and need assistance to retrieve it.

subject: Headset audio issues
description: The audio quality on my headset is very poor. There is static and the sound cuts in and out during calls.

subject: Cannot update project permissions
description: I am trying to update the permissions of my team members in the project management tool, but the 'Save' button is not working. This issue has delayed some of our project progress.

subject: Outlook email notifications delayed
description: I am receiving email notifications in Outlook with a significant delay. It's causing issues in responding to time-sensitive emails.

subject: Laptop charging port broken
description: The charging port on my laptop is no longer functioning, so I cannot charge my laptop. This is a major inconvenience as I need the laptop for work.

subject: Wi-Fi dropping intermittently
description: The Wi-Fi signal drops out frequently in our conference rooms, making it hard to conduct meetings without interruptions.

subject: Server down due to hardware failure
description: The main server has gone offline due to a critical hardware issue, and it’s affecting all connected services.

subject: CRM system not syncing data
description: I’m unable to access the updated customer information across devices. The CRM isn’t syncing properly after the last update.

subject: Slow internet speed during meetings
description: The internet speed slows down dramatically during virtual meetings, making it difficult to participate effectively.

subject: Software update notification bug
description: Every time I launch the software, a notification pops up saying there's a new update available, despite having already updated it.

subject: Permission to access restricted files
description: I’ve been assigned to a project that requires me to access certain files on the shared drive, but I do not have the necessary permissions.

subject: Laptop keyboard malfunction
description: Certain keys on the laptop keyboard are not responding, which is hindering my ability to work efficiently.

subject: Issues with calendar syncing
description: My calendar events are not showing up on my mobile device, even though they are visible on my desktop application.

subject: Intermittent Wi-Fi signal
description: Wi-Fi connectivity is inconsistent, especially in the kitchen and lounge areas. This is causing minor disruptions.

subject: Broken office chair
description: The chair’s backrest is unstable and the wheels do not roll smoothly, making it uncomfortable to use.

subject: Access to the new project folder
description: I’ve been assigned to the new project but do not have the permissions to access the shared project folder where the initial files are stored.

subject: Complete network outage in the office
description: There is a complete network outage, affecting all users in the office. No one can access shared files or use internet resources. Immediate resolution required.

subject: Issue with data synchronization in the CRM
description: The data from our CRM system is not syncing correctly with the email marketing tool. This is causing issues with customer follow-up.

subject: Broken mouse
description: My mouse is intermittently unresponsive, causing delays when working on the computer. I need a replacement.

subject: Permission to access shared project folder
description: I need access to the shared folder for our current project, but I am unable to open it due to permission issues.

subject: Microsoft Teams not launching
description: I tried restarting Teams after the latest update, but it still won't launch. This is blocking my ability to collaborate with the team.

subject: Unclear menu options in new software update
description: The recent update to the project management software introduced new features, but some menu options are unclear and difficult to navigate.

subject: Wi-Fi signal very weak in certain areas
description: In certain sections of the office, the Wi-Fi signal is weak, leading to slow internet speeds and constant disconnections.

subject: Unable to save progress in Google Docs
description: After making edits in Google Docs, the document doesn’t save the changes. This is preventing me from completing my work.

subject: Request to reset password
description: I’ve forgotten my password for the company portal and need it to be reset so I can access it again.

subject: Slow connection to external servers
description: When connecting to external servers, the speed is abysmally slow, which is delaying the data transfer and project timelines.
